name: Sniper Safari Hunting Warrior
description:
Sniper Safari Hunting Warrior 3D is the best free game to increase your confidence level for facing giant animals like stag, wolves, rabbits, elephant, rhinoceros, zebra and dinosaurs. This jungle survival game is a complete challenge to your visional and listening capabilities.The game gives you a brand new real hunting and sniper shooting experience which you might not been able to get in your real life. Those who cannot risk their life hunting wild animals can enjoy real hunting experience by playing this game. You are avatar with a special precise sniper gun to shoot furious wild animals. In this animal hunting ground, beside the thanksgiving meal, you need protect your sniper shooter's glory as well. Be careful as sniper hunting warrior in jungle survival game.
Features
Many types of weapons, sniper rifles
First Person FPS Action Shooting Game
Thrilling, exciting & stimulating missions
Immersive 3D safari jungle environment
